info.name: Sling Dark Monochrome
info.description: A simple dark theme for sling

data.title: Thanks a lot for this, it was needed

style.css:
@-moz-document domain("app.getsling.com") {
body{color:#eee;background-color:#222}.messages-container{background:#222;border:1px solid #333}.messages-container .messages-footer{background:#222}.messages-container .message-author a,.messages-container .message-author span{color:#ddd}.messages-footer-middle textarea{color:#ddd;background-color:#444}.messages-footer-middle .textarea-border.focused{border-color:#777}.conversation-details .big-search input:focus,.conversation-details .big-search input:hover,.conversation-list .big-search input:focus,.conversation-list .big-search input:hover{background-color:#444}.nav-sidebar li.messages-search.result{background-color:#333}body{color:#ccc}.nav-sidebar li.messages-search .small-search input{border-width:0;background-color:#444;color:#ddd}.btn.disabled,.btn.disabled:hover,.btn[disabled],.btn[disabled]:hover,fieldset[disabled] .btn,fieldset[disabled] .btn:hover{color:#ccc;background-color:#333;border-color:#444}.messages-scroller .date-group-header h2{background:#222}avatar .avatar{background:#555;border-radius:5%}avatar:not(.no-shadow)>*{box-shadow:0 0 0 1.5px #ccc}.navbar .navbar-content{background-color:#333;border:1px solid #444}.btn-primary{color:#ddd;background-color:#444;border:1px solid #333}.modal-title,h1,h2{color:#eee}.conversation-group .conversation-in-group a.active{color:#eee;font-weight:800}a.link-as-text:hover{color:#fff;background-color:#333}.conversation-group h4{color:#bbb}.messages-members h4{color:#bbb}.messages-member-group{color:#ccc}.conversation-group .conversation-in-group{color:#999}.container.dashboard .notifications-table .table-row.footer,.container.dashboard .notifications-table .table-row.header,.container.dashboard .notifications-table .table-row.notification,.container.history .notifications-table .table-row.footer,.container.history .notifications-table .table-row.header,.container.history .notifications-table .table-row.notification{color:#ddd;background-color:#333;border:1px solid #444}a.link-as-text:not(:hover){color:#ccc}.bar{background:#444 no-repeat 20px 50%;border:1px solid #555}.manage-menu a.active,.manage-menu a:hover{color:#eee;background-color:#333}.manage-menu a{color:#ccc;background:#333}[sticky].sticky-full-width{background:#222;box-shadow:0 0 0 #222}.container.dashboard .notifications-table .table-row.notification>*,.container.history .notifications-table .table-row.notification>*{background:#333;border:0 solid;border-radius:5px}.sub-navigation .sub-navigation-container{background:#2b2b2b;border-bottom:0 solid #222}.shifts-header-navigation-pane{border-bottom:1px solid #333;background:#222}custom-select:not(.form-control) .custom-select-toggle{color:#bbb;border:1px solid #444}.custom-select .prefix{color:#bbb}custom-select:not(.form-control) .custom-select-label:not(.font-no-uppercase){color:#ccc}custom-select:not(.form-control) .custom-select-toggle:not([disabled]):hover{color:#fff;background-color:#333}.date-range-selector-date-picker .header-button.click-for-datepicker{color:#eee}.btn-cancel:not([disabled]):hover{color:#fff;background-color:#333}.calendar-header{background-color:#444}.calendar-header-cell:not(.color-brand) a{color:#bbb}.calendar-header-cell.color-brand a{color:#eee}.shifts-week .user-group .table-cell.is-today{background:#444}.date-buttons .btn-group .btn-primary{border-color:#444;background:#333;color:#eee}.sub-navigation .nav-items a.active{color:#fff}.sub-navigation .nav-items a{color:#bbbbbbb3}.sub-navigation .nav-items a:hover{color:#eee}.sub-navigation{border-bottom:0 solid #222}.shifts-header-new .reports-header-summary{border-bottom:0 solid #222;background:#222}.text-color-gray{color:#aaa}.color-light-color{color:#aaa}.color-brand{color:#ccc}.btn-cancel{border:1px solid #444}.shifts-container .month-tiles-available h2{color:#ddd!important}.shifts-container .month-tiles table{background:#333}.shifts-container .month-tile.today{background:#444}.container.dashboard .notifications-table .table-row.notification.next-shift.blue-bg,.container.history .notifications-table .table-row.notification.next-shift.blue-bg{background-color:#0000;box-shadow:0 0 0 0 rgba(0,133,255,.3)}.sub-navigation .nav-items a.active{color:#fff;border-bottom:3px solid #fff}custom-select:not(.form-control) .custom-select-label.filter-active{color:#eee}custom-select:not(.form-control) .custom-select-label.filter-active g[fill^="#"] path,custom-select:not(.form-control) .custom-select-label.filter-active path:nth-child(2){fill:#fff}.date-buttons .btn-group .btn-default{border-color:#666;background:#555;color:#eee}.date-buttons .btn-group .btn-default:hover{text-decoration:none;background:#444}.shifts-container .shifts-container.available-shifts h2{color:#eee}.shifts-container .shifts-container.available-shifts,.shifts-container .shifts-container.unassigned-shifts{background:#222}.shifts-container .shifts-container.available-shifts .table-row{background:#333}.shifts-container .shifts-container.available-shifts .shifts-table{border-top-color:#fff}.form-control.form-control-uppercase{-webkit-text-fill-color:#eee!important;border-color:#666;background:#555}.availability-container{color:#ddd}.form-control.form-control-uppercase:not([disabled]).active,.form-control.form-control-uppercase:not([disabled]):focus,.form-control.form-control-uppercase:not([disabled]):hover{background-color:#777}.form-control:hover:not([disabled]){border:1px solid #666}.form-control.active,.form-control:focus{border-color:#ddd!important}.control-label{color:#ddd}.availability-container .availability-header .input-with-label-label,.availability-container .availability-header custom-select .prefix{-webkit-text-fill-color:#aaa}.shifts-container .month-tile{background:#3c3c3c}.shifts-container .month-tiles-available>div::before{background:#fff}.shifts-container .shifts-container h2{color:#bbb}custom-select:not(.form-control) .custom-select-label.filter-active g[fill^="#"] path,custom-select:not(.form-control) .custom-select-label.filter-active path:nth-child(2){fill:#fff;stroke:#fff}.premium-feature-preview .premium-feature-preview-banner-container{background-color:#333}.preview-banner{color:#ccc}.manage-menu a.admin-dashboard.active .icon,.manage-menu a.admin-dashboard:hover .icon{background-image:url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,)}.manage-menu a.admin-dashboard .icon{background-image:url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,)}.manage-menu a.admin-users.active .icon,.manage-menu a.admin-users:hover .icon{background-image:url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,)}.manage-menu a.admin-users .icon{background-image:url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,)}.manage-menu a.admin-date.active .icon,.manage-menu a.admin-date:hover .icon{background-image:url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,)}.manage-menu a.admin-date .icon{background-image:url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,)}.manage-menu a.admin-groups.active .icon,.manage-menu a.admin-groups:hover .icon{background-image:url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,)}.manage-menu a.admin-groups .icon{background-image:url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,)}.manage-menu a.admin-settings.active .icon,.manage-menu a.admin-settings:hover .icon{background-image:url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,)}.manage-menu a.admin-settings .icon{background-image:url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,)}ul.nav-tabs>li.active a,ul.nav-tabs>li.active a:hover{color:#eee}.nav-tabs>li.active>a,.nav-tabs>li.active>a:focus,.nav-tabs>li.active>a:hover{background-color:#333;border:1px solid #444}ul.nav-tabs>li>a{color:#bbb;background:#555;border:1px solid #666}ul.nav-tabs>li>a:hover{background:#777;border:1px solid #888;color:#eee}.nav-tabs{border-bottom:2px solid #666}table.manage-table>thead>tr{border-bottom:1px solid #555;background:#444}a:focus,a:hover{color:#fff}a{color:#ddd}table.manage-table>thead>tr>th{color:#ccc}.manage-list .bar-container{background-color:#222}.bar input.growing{background:#3c3c3c}.big-search input.sleek{background:#3c3c3c;border-color:#666}.big-search input.sleek:hover{background-color:#777}.form-control:hover:not([disabled]){border:1px solid #888}.filters-container .filter-button{background-color:#3c3c3c;border:1px solid #666;color:#aaa}.filters-container .filter-button:hover{background-color:#777}.filters-container.open .filter-button{color:#fff;background-color:#333;border:1px solid #ddd}table.manage-table>tbody>tr:not(.vs-repeat-before-content):not(.vs-repeat-after-content){border-bottom:1px solid #444}table.manage-table:not(.readonly)>tbody>tr:hover,table.manage-table:not(.readonly)>tbody>tr:hover .checkmark-wrapper{background-color:#333}table.manage-table>tbody>tr>td{color:#ccc}table.manage-table td a{color:#fff}.dropdown-menu .dropdown-main-ul,ul.dropdown-menu{background-color:#444}.user-settings-container .nav-tabs{background:#222}.user-settings-container{color:#ddd}.settings-sections .section shift-appearance .description,.settings-sections .section small{color:#bbb}scrollspy ul li a.active{background:#ffffff4d;color:#fff}scrollspy ul li a{color:#aaa}.form-control{border:1px solid #444;color:#ccc}[input-with-label] .input-with-label-label{color:#aaa}input[switcher]:checked+label{background-color:#555}.newsfeed-header-container{background:#222}.newsfeed-form{border-radius:4px;background:#333;border:1px solid #444}.newsfeed-form textarea{background:#222;color:#eee}.btn-primary{color:#ddd;background-color:#444;border:1px solid #333}.btn-primary:hover{color:#eee;background-color:#666;border:1px solid #888}.date-group-header h2{color:#ddd;background:#222}.article-container article{background:#333;border:1px solid #444}.article-container article .article-header h3{color:#eee}.article-container article .article-header .link-to-profile{color:#eee}.article-container article .article-header .col-xs-15,.article-container article .article-header .text-right{color:#aaa}.article-container article .article-body{color:#ddd}.article-container article .article-footer{color:#aaa}.newsfeed-pages-header{color:#bbb;border-bottom:1px solid #ccc}.newsfeed-pages-items a{color:#ccc}.newsfeed-notifications a{color:#aaa}.newsfeed-notifications span{color:#888}.well{background:#333;border:1px solid #444}.tasks .tasks-columns{background-color:#222}.empty-state-gradient{color:#ccc;background:#222}.tasks .done footer{color:#ccc}.navbar .notification-badge{background:#ddd;color:#333}.messages-container .messages-header h1 a{color:#eee}.unread-badge{background:#fff;color:#333}.conversation-group .conversation-in-group:hover{background-color:#fff1}.btn-primary-inversed:hover{color:#ddd;background-color:#555;border:1px solid #666}.btn-success-inversed:hover{color:#ddd;background-color:#555;border:1px solid #666}.btn-success-inversed{color:#ddd;background-color:#333;border:1px solid #555}.btn-primary-inversed{color:#ddd;background-color:#444;border:1px solid #555}.container.dashboard .notifications-table .table-row.notification.next-shift .notification-actions .btn:not(:hover),.container.history .notifications-table .table-row.notification.next-shift .notification-actions .btn:not(:hover){background:#444}.shifts-container .month-tiles-week tfoot td{color:#ccc}.shifts-container .month-tiles-week tfoot td.today:not(.holiday-rate){background-color:hsla(0,0%,50%,.5)}#shifts-main-container{background:#222}body:not(.print-body) #shifts-main-container,body:not(.print-body) .shifts-container-new{background:#333}.reports-bar-container{background:#333}body:not(.print-body) no-show-table table.table tfoot tr>:first-child,body:not(.print-body) no-show-table table.table thead tr>:first-child,body:not(.print-body) payroll-table-grouped table.table tfoot tr>:first-child,body:not(.print-body) payroll-table-grouped table.table thead tr>:first-child,body:not(.print-body) reports-table table.table tfoot tr>:first-child,body:not(.print-body) reports-table table.table thead tr>:first-child,body:not(.print-body) sales-table table.table tfoot tr>:first-child,body:not(.print-body) sales-table table.table thead tr>:first-child,body:not(.print-body) timesheets-table table.table tfoot tr>:first-child,body:not(.print-body) timesheets-table table.table thead tr>:first-child{background:#444}body:not(.print-body) no-show-table table.table td:first-child,body:not(.print-body) no-show-table table.table th:first-child,body:not(.print-body) payroll-table-grouped table.table td:first-child,body:not(.print-body) payroll-table-grouped table.table th:first-child,body:not(.print-body) reports-table table.table td:first-child,body:not(.print-body) reports-table table.table th:first-child,body:not(.print-body) sales-table table.table td:first-child,body:not(.print-body) sales-table table.table th:first-child,body:not(.print-body) timesheets-table table.table td:first-child,body:not(.print-body) timesheets-table table.table th:first-child{background-color:#333}body:not(.print-body) no-show-table table.table tbody tr:hover>:first-child,body:not(.print-body) payroll-table-grouped table.table tbody tr:hover>:first-child,body:not(.print-body) reports-table table.table tbody tr:hover>:first-child,body:not(.print-body) sales-table table.table tbody tr:hover>:first-child,body:not(.print-body) timesheets-table table.table tbody tr:hover>:first-child{background-color:#444}table.manage-table>tfoot tr{background:#333}.reports-view .manage-table tfoot{color:#ccc}.draggable-columns-enabled [draggable-columns] [draggable-columns-item]:hover{background:#666}a.link-as-text:hover{color:#fff;background-color:#666}
}
